== Chelakkara (CT) (627768) ==

Chelakkara (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 3.79 sq. km. and harbouring 1691 households with total population of 7528 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 34 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 315 km. Male population is 3535 and female population is 3993. Scheduled Caste population is 412 and Scheduled Tribes population is 1. Census Location Code of the town is 627768<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 34 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 114 km. Railway station is at Wadakkanchery at a distance of 20 km.
